uha hara mahīnē kōśiśa kara rihā sī
ਉਹ ਹਰ ਮਹੀਨੇ ਕੋਸ਼ਿਸ਼ ਕਰ ਰਿਹਾ ਸੀ
He had been trying for each month
He had been trying for a good week
uha cagē haphatē tōṁ kōśiśa kara rihā sī
ਉਹ ਚੰਗੇ ਹਫਤੇ ਤੋਂ ਕੋਸ਼ਿਸ਼ ਕਰ ਰਿਹਾ ਸੀ
He had been trying for a good week
He had been trying for the first week
uha pahilē hafatē tōṁ kōśiśa kara rihā sī
ਉਹ ਪਹਿਲੇ ਹਫ਼ਤੇ ਤੋਂ ਕੋਸ਼ਿਸ਼ ਕਰ ਰਿਹਾ ਸੀ
He had been trying for the first week
He had been trying for a many a week
uha ika haphatē tōṁ bahuta kōśiśa kara rihā sī
ਉਹ ਇੱਕ ਹਫਤੇ ਤੋਂ ਬਹੁਤ ਕੋਸ਼ਿਸ਼ ਕਰ ਰਿਹਾ ਸੀ
He had been trying for a many a week
He had been trying for each week
uha hara hafatē kōśiśa kara rihā sī
ਉਹ ਹਰ ਹਫ਼ਤੇ ਕੋਸ਼ਿਸ਼ ਕਰ ਰਿਹਾ ਸੀ
He had been trying for each week
He had been leaving a good business
uha cagā kārōbāra chaḍa rihā sī
ਉਹ ਚੰਗਾ ਕਾਰੋਬਾਰ ਛੱਡ ਰਿਹਾ ਸੀ
He had been leaving a good business
He had been leaving each business
uha harēka kārōbāra nū chaḍa rihā sī
ਉਹ ਹਰੇਕ ਕਾਰੋਬਾਰ ਨੂੰ ਛੱਡ ਰਿਹਾ ਸੀ
He had been leaving each business
He had been calling the first mother
uha pahilī māṁ nū bulā rihā sī
ਉਹ ਪਹਿਲੀ ਮਾਂ ਨੂੰ ਬੁਲਾ ਰਿਹਾ ਸੀ
He had been calling the first mother
He had been calling his many mothers
uha āpaṇī'āṁ bahuta sārī'āṁ māvāṁ nū bulā rihā sī
ਉਹ ਆਪਣੀਆਂ ਬਹੁਤ ਸਾਰੀਆਂ ਮਾਵਾਂ ਨੂੰ ਬੁਲਾ ਰਿਹਾ ਸੀ
He had been calling his many mothers
He had been calling each mother
uha hara māṁ nū bulā'undā rihā sī
ਉਹ ਹਰ ਮਾਂ ਨੂੰ ਬੁਲਾਉਂਦਾ ਰਿਹਾ ਸੀ
He had been calling each mother
